newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippine Jardine to sell affiliates.
newsitem.headline: Philippine Jardine to sell affiliates.

text.p: Jardine Davies Inc said on Friday its board had approved a plan to dispose of its entire equity holdings in three of its affiliates.

Corporate secretary B.S. Chungunco told the Philipine Stock Exchange that the company planned to sell 75,000 shares in Thorn Lighting (Philippines) Inc, where it holds a 50 percent equity stake; 140,000 shares in Jardine Wines and Spirits Philippines Inc, where it holds 40 percent, and 300,000 shares in Jardine Aboitiz Insurance Brokers Inc, where it holds 27.5 percent.
Chungunco did not say how much the company, 72 percent owned by Jardine Matheson Holdings Ltd, is expected to generate from the sale, but said the matter would be finalised within the year.
He said the plan was part of its corporate restructuring.
Jardine has interests in securities broking, life insurance, shipping, manufacturing and distribution of cement, refractories and timber.
